text:
Delivering Good is eternally grateful to Bethenny Frankel for her generosity in partnering with us. Together, we worked with community partners in more than 10 regions around the world facing the crisis of natural disaster, working with local agencies to assess their needs and provide immediate help.

Because of you, we raised over $1,400,000 in support of recovering communities, providing funds for emergency supplies and gift cards to buy essential clothing and goods.

We are grateful to have had the opportunity to work with Bethenny; thank you to everyone who contributed to this crucial effort.

If you have any questions, please email us at [email protected].

Click here to view the complete list of 2017 B Strong Financial Donors.
title: B Strong Disaster Relief – Delivering Good
